inputs.name: options
inputs.description: Options passed to mypy. Use `mypy --help` to see available options.

inputs.name: paths
inputs.description: Explicit paths to run mypy on. Defaults to the current directory.

inputs.name: install_types
inputs.description: Whether to automatically install missing library stub packages. ('yes'|'no', default: 'yes')

inputs.name: install_project_dependencies
inputs.description: Whether to attempt to install project dependencies into mypy environment. ('yes'|'no', default: 'yes')
